Sentencas: Gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) sols were synthesized by the controlled hydrolysis and condensation of cerium(IV) isopropoxide with each gadolinia doping agent to make a dense GDC diffusion barrier for solid oxide electrolyte cells (SOECs) and intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: The crystallinity of a GDC sol using gadolinium(111) isopropoxide as the doping agent was five to six times stronger than that when using gadolinium(BI) nitrate hydrate as the doping agent.
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: The GDC diffusion bather was fully densified by infiltration of a GDC sol into a porous GDC structure under heat treatment at 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: The performance of a cell was highly improved from 0.60 W/cm(2) to 0.92 W/cm(2) at 750 degrees C by densification of the diffusion bather.
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: EIS results suggest that the improved performance is mainly due to the reduced ohmic resistance through the composite electrolyte (i.e., YSZ/GDC).
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: Finally, the degradation of a single cell with a dense GDC was maintained below 1.72%/1000 h, which was lower than that of a cell with a porous GDC (7.69%/1000 h).
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process

Sentencas: Based on these results, it can be concluded that the enhancement of the performance and durability of a single cell with a dense GDC was the result of reduced ohmic resistance through the composite electrolyte.
Titulo: Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process
Densification of gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barriers for SOECs and IT-SOFCs by a sol-gel process
